scripts.start: concurrently --names TEST,COMPILER -k "chokidar '../build/tests' -c 'yarn test'" "cd ../src/dotnet/Fable.Compiler && dotnet watch run yarn-splitter --cwd ../../../tests --fable-core ../../../build/fable-core"
scripts.build: rm -rf .fable && cd ../src/dotnet/Fable.Compiler && dotnet run -c Release yarn-splitter --cwd ../../../tests --fable-core ../../../build/fable-core
